content.rendered:
Directed by Imtiaz Ali.

Written by Imtiaz Ali.

Cast Shah Rukh Khan(Harinder ‘Harry’ Singh Nehra). Anushka Sharma(Sejal Zaveri). BjÃ¶rn Freiberg(Bar Guy). Bruce Huther(Clubber). Attila G. Kerekes(Clubber). Christina Murphy(Club Waitress). Daxesh Patel(Tourist). Rana Ranbir(Harry’s Friend). Chandan Roy Sanyal(Gas). Evelyn Sharma(Irina).Manjot Singh.Anjan Srivastav. Aru Krishansh Verma(Mayank). Preetkiran((as Preet Kiran)). Ulrica de la Mar(Waitress). Denis Dorokhov(Russian mafiosi). Suhani Gandhi(Bride). Martavious Cerrone Gayles(Anthony (as Martavius Gayles)). Amit Ghosh(Bangladeshi Goon). Pippa Hughes(Wedding Guest). Leon Malnay(Boy at Wedding). Lola Malnay(Flower Girl).Hossein Rahmani Manesh. Jasmin Ottenburg(Wedding guest). Teena Paradkar(Dancer). Umair Patel(Musical Artist (archive sound)). Hans Peterson(Restaurant Owner). Vineeta Thakur(Harry’s sister). CaesÃ¡r van Daal(Airport Visitor (uncredited))

LanguagesHindi.

Producers Juan Amin. Bunty Arora. Ondrej BerÃ¡nek. Ashish Chauhan. Martin Hulovec. Md Anan Islam. Gauri Khan. Saurabh Khandelwal. Zita Kisgergely. Sanne Rosinga. Rajesh Sharma. Leti Singh. Sander Verdonk.

Production New Amsterdam Film Compan. Red Chillies Entertainmen.
